name: Caravanserai
description: A fortified caravanserai provides safe lodging and supplies for traveling merchants, creating a hub for trade routes and information exchange. The diverse clientele offers unique opportunities for trade and intelligence gathering, while the valuable cargo attracts thieves and bandits.
atmosphere: Fortified walls surround a central courtyard where camels rest beside merchant stalls. The air fills with exotic spices and foreign tongues as traders from distant lands conduct business. Water wells and stables serve traveling caravans while armed guards patrol the walls.
